CustomField.description: This field will be a formula to determine if late fee is applicable
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( AND( ISBLANK(Invoice_Paid_in_Full_On__c), (Payment_Due_Date__c < TODAY()) ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Invoice_Paid_in_Full_On__c)), (Payment_Due_Date__c < Invoice_Paid_in_Full_On__c ) ) ), true, false )
CustomField.label: Charge Late Fee
